investigation.title: SpaceX Inspiration4 T-Cell Histone Modification Profiling (H3K4me1, H3K4me3, H3K27ac)
investigation.description: The SpaceX Inspiration4 mission was a 3-day mission with four private astronauts to low Earth orbit that occurred in September 2021. T-cells were isolated from whole blood in one crew member at the R+194 timepoint for histone modification quantification as a proof of concept study, as no histone modifications have been previously studied in astronaut cohorts.

project.funding: Funding provided by NASA, NIH, and philanthropic donations NNX14AH50G, NNX17AB26G, 80NSSC22K0254, NNH18ZTT001N-FG2, NNX16AO69A

publications.summary: Collection of Biospecimens from the Inspiration4 Mission Establishes the Standards for the Space Omics and Medical Atlas (SOMA) — 10.1038/s41467-024-48806-z
